title: Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. Currently, it only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus. Currently, it only takes focus when the combo list is dropped down.
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo "Host:".
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Locate the first Combo labeled "Host:".
3. Click on the first Combo.
Expected result: The focus caret should be in the first Combo.
